title: PBE access page says I have been accepted but when I go to log in it says cant find account
body: I had an account back before PBE and main accounts merged and it had the same username but when I try to log into it it's disabled, but I can't log onto the pbe with this account either as it says invalid pass/username combination.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and see the account you're posting from already has a PBE account.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help recover it for you if you don't recall the credentials.  We'll reply back asap!
